content: I used several of these apps (Coffee Meets Bagel, Siren) before I met my boyfriend and found them shallow and gimmicky. Dating Ring sounds like it has more to it, but would be tough to scale. I’d love to see something open-source that evolves based on user feedback and needs. The OKCupid forums are filled with such requests and there are lots of custom hacks people have built to do things that applications won’t give them like the Better OKCupid Chrome extension. It just seems app makers would rather tout gimmicks than learn from actual users.
